actions.name: Actions
actions.description:
Weapon [Attack]: 3 (d6) or (by Weapon)
Variants: Normal (Sling 2/d4, Dagger 2/d4), Alchemist (Alchemist's Fire 3/d6 5/Day + Burning Cd6), Warrior (Armor 2, Spear 3/d6)

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Pack Instincts: If one of its Allies is within 5 feet of a Target of this Being's Attack, that Target is Vulnerable against the Attack.
